flawed_nl_solution:
He runs at 0.1 miles per minute because 6 / 60 = <<6/60=0.1>>0.1
While the album is playing he can run 4 miles because 40 x 0.1 = <<40*0.1=4>>4
He has to run 4 miles without the album because 6 - 4 = <<6-4=4>>4
Without music he runs 4/60 miles per minute because 4 / 60 = 4/60
He will run the remaining 4 miles in 60 minutes because 4 / (4/60) = <<4/(4/60)=60>>60
It will take him 100 minutes in total because 40 + 60 =<<40+60=100>>100
#### 100

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2, not 4. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
